descriptor.name: Cool look t-shirt
descriptor.short_desc: Two collor T-shirt, has a round collar, and short sleeves
descriptor.long_desc: Elevate the look of your wardrobe with a few more basic tees like this high-end cotton one from Louis Philippe. Throw on your favourite pair of chinos and loafers with this maroon number for a stroll around the block or casual hangout with friends.
